page.title: 13 OUR HEADMISTRESS
page.content: We interviewed our Headmistress about her life, here is what she told us. She lives in a village two and a half miles from school. She has a brother and a sister who live near Hereford with her mother and father. She has been here for nearly three years. She has taught at six other schools. The thing she likes about teaching is helping children to do things they find difficult. Her hobbies are painting, drawing, tennis, badminton, gardening and listening to music. She says it is difficult being a teacher and a Head because there are a lot of interruptions during class time. When she was little she used to like puzzles, balls, skipping and dolls. She still has a doll in her attic. She thought she might like to be an air -hostess so that she could travel, or be a teacher when she grew up.
